channel.title: tailwind on Kyle Malloy, PE
channel.description: Recent content in tailwind on Kyle Malloy, PE

item.title: Fireship FKIT Course Notes
item.description: I recently completed the Sveltekit Full Course from Fireship.io where you build a Linktree clone using Sveltekit, Firebase, Tailwind, and Daisy UI. As someone new to web development in general, I ran into some problems along the way.

item.title: Linktree Clone
item.description: Live Demo | Source Code Features # 💪 Server-side rendering, SEO, data fetching, and caching 🍪 Cookie-based user authentication 💥 Complex forms with SvelteKit Actions 🤏 Drag-and-drop interface 🎨 Svelte animations with real-world data
